backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor defining state, types, and logic for BTC-backed credit balances, transfers, user profiles, reserve tracking, and admin authorization.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old SendBTCRequest records to include the new diagnosticData field while preserving all other actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test identifiers.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend files describing their purpose and functionality for planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer defining OKLCH color variables and light/dark theme tokens for global styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application root and main script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router and authentication gate handling routing, admin verification, profile setup, and global layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminAccess: UI screen shown when a user's principal is not recognized as admin, displaying diagnostics, copy action, and retry/sign‑out options.
Loading screen that verifies admin access, showing elapsed time and exposing retry/sign‑out actions after a delay.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminTroubl: Troubleshooting card shown to non-admin authenticated users, allowing copying the principal ID and retrying the admin check.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout and clearing related caches.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter and save their name during profile setup.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Application header with navigation, profile display, login button, and conditional admin link.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout wrapper including header, admin troubleshooting card, content area, and footer.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Transf: Table displaying transaction history with formatted details and a dialog for verifying selected transfers.
frontend/src/components/transfers/Verify: Dialog component for verifying and confirming BTC transfer requests, showing status and handling transaction ID submission.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, loading and managing user identities and login state through Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for user profiles, wallets, balances, admin checks, and BTC transfers.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining theme variables, dark mode, and common UI utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering the main App component.
Admin page displaying principal ID, balance, and available admin capabilities with navigation to the admin panel.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin interface for managing balances, transferring credits, sending BTC, and handling reserve actions with validation and status displays.
frontend/src/pages/BuyCreditsPage.tsx: Page for users to submit Bitcoin transaction IDs to purchase credits and view current credit balance.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: User dashboard showing balance, USD estimate, wallet info, and recent transactions with copy-to-clipboard support.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays full transaction history with summaries of credits, debits, and auto-opening of specific transfer requests.
frontend/src/pages/PuzzleRewardsPage.tsx: Allows users to solve puzzles for credit rewards, view available puzzles, and see their BTC-denominated balance.
frontend/src/pages/SendBtcPage.tsx: React page for sending BTC that handles input, fee estimation, balance checks, submitting on-chain transfer requests, and showing success/failure results.
frontend/src/utils/adminStatusCache.ts: Provides a TTL-based localStorage cache for per-principal admin status with in-memory tracking for current page-load verification.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Normalizes backend Send BTC errors into clear user-facing messages, covering address issues, insufficient funds, and broadcast failures.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using both query strings and hash routing with sessionStorage support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and layout with custom theme variables and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state description including BTC-backed credit model, admin flow, custodial wallet design, and known issues with broadcast failures.
